meanings.definition: Not representing or acting on behalf of others.
meanings.sent1: The group of nonrepresentatives individuals had no authority to make decisions.
meanings.sent2: It was clear that the nonrepresentatives team had no power to negotiate.
meanings.sent3: The nonrepresentatives group tried to lead the meeting, but everyone just laughed.
meanings.sent4: The nonrepresentatives candidates were like shadows in the election campaign.
meanings.sent5: The nonrepresentatives role was to observe and not participate.

meanings.definition: Those who do not represent others.
meanings.sent1: The nonrepresentatives in the crowd stayed silent during the protest.
meanings.sent2: The nonrepresentatives were not allowed to speak on behalf of the organization.
meanings.sent3: The nonrepresentatives at the party were content to listen and watch.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the nonrepresentatives were the background characters.
meanings.sent5: The nonrepresentatives were present but had no say in the decision-making process.
